voice_instruct: A bright, confident young man's voice with warmth and charm, energetic and sincere, like a beloved prince who fights with joy rather than duty

tracks.title: Shardbearer
tracks.prompt: energetic arena rock, bright male vocals, driving guitar riff, anthemic drums, Queens of the Stone Age meets Muse, E major, 84 BPM, dueling arena swagger, golden confidence
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Shardplate locks around me and the crowd is on its feet
ten thousand voices in the arena, the drum of heartbeat
I am Adolin Kholin, son of the Blackthorn, heir to the war
and I was born for this moment, this is what the Blade is for

stance one, Windstance, the opening position learned at eight
father's hand on mine, correcting angle, correcting weight
I have fought fourteen full-Shard duels and I have won them all
not because I am the strongest but because I do not stall

[chorus]
Shardbearer, Shardbearer, golden boy of the Kholin line
Shardbearer, Shardbearer, the arena is mine
Blade in hand, Plate on back, crowd screaming for the hit
I was made for the spotlight and I will not quit

[verse 2]
Relis Ruthar challenged first, Elit came for the crown
Eranniv brought technique, I brought them all down
the dueling circuit is my kingdom, the arena is my floor
and every stance I learned from father is a language for the war

but the real fight is not the duel, the real fight is the four
Shardbearers who ambushed me in the championship's core
and Kaladin, the bridgeman, jumped in with a spear
and for the first time in the arena, I felt something close to fear

[bridge]
I love the duel, I love the dance of Plate and Blade
the precision, the footwork, the calculated trade
but the arena taught me something dueling books do not say
the best fighter is the one who knows when not to play

[chorus]
Shardbearer, Shardbearer, golden boy of the Kholin line
Shardbearer, Shardbearer, the arena is mine
Blade in hand, Plate on back, crowd screaming for the hit
I was made for the spotlight and I will not quit

tracks.title: Sadeas in the Corridor
tracks.prompt: dark power rock, bright male vocals turning grim, heavy guitar drop, tension percussion, Royal Blood meets Black Keys, D minor, 78 BPM, murder in marble halls, golden boy's dark turn
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Sadeas stood in the corridor with that smile, that knowing smile
the man who left my father's army on the Tower to die in file
the man who plotted, schemed, who wore his cruelty like cologne
and he said he would do it again, standing there in the hallway alone

I did not plan it, I did not calculate, I did not think
I just saw his face and the smile and the link
between that smile and twenty thousand soldiers left to bleed
and my hand found his throat and my Blade found the need

[chorus]
I killed Sadeas in the corridor and I do not regret
the blood on the marble, the look in his eyes, the debt
he owed to every bridgeman, every Kholin soldier dead
I killed Sadeas and the golden boy saw red

[verse 2]
they would call it murder, father would call it wrong
the Codes say we do not kill outside the battlefield's song
but the battlefield was everywhere, Sadeas made it so
and the corridor was just another plateau

I hid the body, I hid the truth, I carried it alone
for weeks the secret sat inside me like a second Oathstone
and when I finally told my father what I had done
he did not condemn me, he just said, it has begun

[bridge]
I am not Kaladin, I do not carry guilt like a shrine
I am not Dalinar, I do not confess my every crime
I killed a man who deserved it and I would kill him twice
and the golden boy learned that day that goodness has a price

[chorus]
I killed Sadeas in the corridor and I do not regret
the blood on the marble, the look in his eyes, the debt
he owed to every bridgeman, every Kholin soldier dead
I killed Sadeas and the golden boy saw red

tracks.title: Maya
tracks.prompt: warm melodic rock, bright male vocals softening, acoustic guitar and electric layers, Foo Fighters meets Death Cab for Cutie, G major, 76 BPM, talking to a dead sword, tenderness and determination
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
my Shardblade screams when I summon her, ten heartbeats of pain
the dead spren inside the metal, crying, not quite sane
but I started talking to her anyway, the way you talk to rain
hello, I said, I am Adolin, and I do not know your name

the other Shardbearers think their Blades are tools, just steel
but I felt something in the summoning, something almost real
a flicker in the mist, a shape that tried to form
a woman made of vines and light, broken by the storm

[chorus]
Maya, I am talking to you, can you hear
Maya, I am holding you, I am right here
they say the deadeyes are gone, they say the bond is done
but I feel you pushing back against the nothing, reaching for the sun

[verse 2]
in Shadesmar she walked behind me, stumbling, eyes like glass
the deadeye cultivationspren who should have been my past
but I held her hand and I spoke to her and I refused to leave
and in the market of the spren she tugged my sleeve

the honorspren said humans broke the oaths, the Recreance was our sin
but Maya was not broken by me, she was broken by them
the Radiants who gave up their Blades, who killed ten thousand spren
and Maya chose to come with me despite what happened then

[bridge]
I am not a Radiant, I do not speak the Words
I do not bond with spren, I do not carry oaths like swords
but I can talk to a dead woman and treat her like she is alive
and sometimes that is all it takes for something to survive

[chorus]
Maya, I am talking to you, can you hear
Maya, I am holding you, I am right here
they say the deadeyes are gone, they say the bond is done
but I feel you pushing back against the nothing, reaching for the sun

tracks.title: Lasting Integrity
tracks.prompt: dramatic rock building to anthemic peak, bright male vocals, courtroom tension to triumphant release, Muse meets Biffy Clyro, A minor to A major, 80 BPM, trial by honor, the dead spren speaks
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
the honorspren put humanity on trial in their fortress of glass
Lasting Integrity, the court of the bond, where they judge what has passed
they said the Recreance proved that humans cannot be trusted
that every oath is a weapon that will eventually be rusted

I stood as defendant, Adolin Kholin, not a Radiant, not a sage
just a man with a dead sword and a willingness to engage
the evidence was damning, three thousand years of proof
that when humans bond with spren, the bond comes off the roof

[chorus]
but Maya spoke, Maya spoke in the court of the dead
Maya pushed through the deadeye silence and this is what she said
we chose, we chose, the spren were not the victims of the oath
we chose to die with our Radiants, we chose to honor both

[verse 2]
the courtroom gasped, a deadeye had not spoken in millennia
a broken spren with vines for hair and eyes like empty trivia
and she said we chose, three times she forced the words through the haze
and every honorspren in that room remembered other days

the Recreance was not betrayal from one side alone
the Knights and the spren chose together, they walked into the stone
and Maya's testimony shattered every accusation
because the dead remembered what the living lost to resignation

[bridge]
I am not the hero of this story, Maya is the proof
that love can survive the breaking, that love can lift the roof
of a prison built on grief and three millennia of shame
and a dead spren saying we chose is the brightest kind of flame

[chorus]
but Maya spoke, Maya spoke in the court of the dead
Maya pushed through the deadeye silence and this is what she said
we chose, we chose, the spren were not the victims of the oath
we chose to die with our Radiants, we chose to honor both

tracks.title: Not My Father
tracks.prompt: honest melodic rock, bright male vocals with vulnerability, clean guitar verses building to full band, Jimmy Eat World meets Weezer, F major, 78 BPM, shadow of a legend, finding your own shape
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
my father is the Blackthorn, the most feared warrior alive
he burned a city, bonded a god, and somehow survived
his shadow is the shape of Alethkar, his name is the war
and I am the son who stands beside him, wondering what I am for

I am not a Radiant, I do not hear the Words
I cannot hold the stormlight, I cannot call the birds
of honor or of truth or of whatever makes a Knight
I am just good with a sword and I look good in the light

[chorus]
I am not my father, I am not the storm
I am not the legend, I am not the form
I am Adolin, the one who talks to swords
and loves too easily and fights with joy, not lords

[verse 2]
Renarin sees the future and it terrifies us both
he is a Truthwatcher with a corrupted spren who broke the oath
of normalcy, my little brother who I protected every day
and now he sees the end of things and I cannot take it away

father writes books and builds coalitions and speaks with gods
Kaladin flies and Shallan shapeshifts and the world bends the odds
around them like ta'veren, like the universe knows their name
and I am the guy who showed up with good hair and a training frame

[bridge]
but maybe that is enough, maybe the world does not need
another chosen one with a cosmic destiny and a creed
maybe it needs the man who talks to his sword and means it
who loves his family openly and is not ashamed to be in it

[chorus]
I am not my father, I am not the storm
I am not the legend, I am not the form
I am Adolin, the one who talks to swords
and loves too easily and fights with joy, not lords

tracks.title: Fashion and War
tracks.prompt: fun upbeat rock, bright male vocals, catchy guitar hook, energetic drums, Weezer meets Fountains of Wayne, Bb major, 86 BPM, lighthearted but earned, the prince who cares about his outfit
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
yes I care about my jacket, yes I coordinate the seams
yes I spent an hour this morning matching my Plate's color schemes
Kaladin thinks it is vain, Shallan thinks it is a mask
but a man who dresses well is a man worth asking, ask

the Alethi are a martial culture, we have dueling and we have codes
and in between the battles there are ballrooms and episodes
of political maneuvering that require a different blade
the art of the well-tailored coat is a skill that cannot fade

[chorus]
fashion and war, they are not so different
fashion and war, both require commitment
the right cut for the right occasion, the right stance for the right fight
and looking good while doing good is not a lesser light

[verse 2]
I have dated half the women in the warcamp, this is true
each one taught me something different about the world's point of view
but Shallan, Shallan with her three faces and her artist's hand
she is the one who sees through the jacket and still wants to stand

beside me in the arena, beside me in the dark
beside me in the tailor's shop arguing about a mark
on a collar that she says is fine and I say is not straight
and this is love, the argument about the collar, not the fate

[bridge]
they will write songs about the Radiants and the war
they will write epics about father's stand on Thaylen shore
but someone should write a song about the small things in between
the jacket, the joke, the held hand, the scene

[chorus]
fashion and war, they are not so different
fashion and war, both require commitment
the right cut for the right occasion, the right stance for the right fight
and looking good while doing good is not a lesser light

tracks.title: Renarin
tracks.prompt: emotional power ballad rock, bright male vocals turning tender, piano and guitar interplay, Foo Fighters meets Gaslight Anthem, Eb major, 74 BPM, brotherhood, protecting the different one
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
my brother sees the future in stained glass behind his eyes
Glys, his corrupted spren, shows him visions that paralyze
Renarin shakes when it happens, his body locks and bends
and I hold him through it every time because that is what brothers defend

they mocked him in the warcamps, called him weak, called him strange
a Kholin son who could not fight, who could not match the range
of what a lighteyes prince should be in Alethi expectation
but Renarin's courage is the quiet kind that does not need ovation

[chorus]
Renarin, little brother, I have got you, I am here
Renarin, the bravest Kholin is the one who lives with fear
you see what is coming and you stand there anyway
that is more courage than a duel on any day

[verse 2]
he picked up a Shardblade knowing it would scream in his hand
he charged into battle shaking, barely able to stand
not because he was fearless but because he was terrified
and he went anyway because his family was inside

Glys is a corruption, an Enlightened spren they say
a Truthwatcher bonded to something that shows the wrong way
but Renarin's visions have saved us more than once from the dark
and the wrong way sometimes turns out to be the spark

[bridge]
father loves us both but he does not always see
the way the world bends around Renarin differently than me
I see it though, I have always seen it, since we were small
my brother is the strongest person I know, period, end of call

[chorus]
Renarin, little brother, I have got you, I am here
Renarin, the bravest Kholin is the one who lives with fear
you see what is coming and you stand there anyway
that is more courage than a duel on any day

tracks.title: The Golden Son
tracks.prompt: triumphant arena rock finale, bright male vocals at full power, massive guitar hook, stadium drums, Muse meets Queens of the Stone Age meets Foo Fighters, A major, 82 BPM, joyful defiance, the ordinary hero
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I am not the chosen one, I do not have a spren who glows
I am not the prophesied, I am not the one who knows
the secrets of the cosmere or the architecture of the sky
I am the golden son of Alethkar and I am going to try

Maya stirs in my grip, more alive each day
the deadeye who remembered how to say
we chose, and with those words she broke a seal
that had held ten thousand spren in a prison made of zeal

[chorus]
I am the golden son and I am not ashamed
of being ordinary in a world of gods and flame
I swing my Blade with joy, I wear my Plate with pride
and I stand beside the Radiants with nothing left to hide

[verse 2]
Shallan is integrating, all three of her in one
father is building something greater than the battles he has won
Kaladin is healing, slowly, like a dawn that takes its time
and Renarin sees tomorrow and refuses to decline

and I am here, in the middle, holding them together
not with oaths or cosmic bonds but with leather
and jokes and fashion tips and the willingness to show
that you do not need a destiny to be worth the glow

[bridge]
Maya reaches through the veil, her fingers finding mine
not a bond like a Radiant has, but something just as fine
a friendship between a man and a sword that should not be alive
and the proof that you can heal the dead if you refuse to let them die

[chorus]
I am the golden son and I am not ashamed
of being ordinary in a world of gods and flame
I swing my Blade with joy, I wear my Plate with pride
and I stand beside the Radiants with nothing left to hide

[outro]
the arena is empty now, the crowd has gone home
but the golden son is still here
practicing his stances
talking to his sword
and smiling
